item.title: Treasuries Surge Most Since June Ahead of Government Debt Plans
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- US Treasuries jumped the most in a month as investors flocked to an auction of seven-year notes ahead of the announcement of the size of the governmentâ€™s future debt sales. Yields fell across all tenors after investors snapped up $44 billion of the notes in the Tuesday afternoon sale....
